page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
Farming and its associated services are still the main source of employment in our area. However, the numbers employed in farming are going down steadily owing to the use of modern machinery and the joining of small farms into larger units.
A number of people from the area are employed in and around the larger towns of Helston and Camborne/Redruth in a variety of occupations.
There are a rising number of unemployed people, especially among school-leavers as many local firms have closed down or are not taking on new employees. Prospects for the future are not encouraging at the present time.
